artifacts_sets_4_piece.4bonus: Opening chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

Upon obtaining a crystal created through a Geo Elemental Reaction, all party members gain 35% RES to that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental RES can be gained in this manner at any one time.
When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.
After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.
Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP.
Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.
Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party.
Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.
After using Elemental Skill, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.
Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%.
Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.
Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

artifacts_sets_4_piece.2bonus: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
artifacts_sets_4_piece.4bonus: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.
Using an Elemental Burst increase all party memebers' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.
Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

artifacts_sets_4_piece.2bonus: Increases the effectiveness of shields by 35%
artifacts_sets_4_piece.4bonus: Gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG while under the protection of a shield.
Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occurs once every 3s.
Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for other party members every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.
Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.
Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%.
Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.
Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.
Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.
Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

overview.shortdesc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack 
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.  

Charged Attack 
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
combat_talent.name: Foreign Rockblade

combat_talent.desc:
You discussed the falling stars with Paimon. Summon a meteorite to strike down, causing an explosion and dealing Geo DMG to all enemies in range. 
The meteorite is climbable and can block attacks. Hold to adjust its impact location. The meteorite is affiliated with Geo.
combat_talent.name: Starfell Sword

combat_talent.desc:
Energize the Geo elements deep underground, causing a great tremor and expanding shockwave, which knocks surrounding enemies back and deals Geo DMG while inflicting them with Crystallization. A stonewall is also erected at the edge of the shockwave. 
The stonewall is unclimbable and can block attacks. 
The stonewall is affiliated with Geo.
combat_talent.name: Wake of Earth

constellations.desc: Allies within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.
constellations.name: Invincible Stonewall

constellations.desc: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.
constellations.name: Rockcore Meltdown

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Wake of Earth by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Will of the Rock

constellations.desc: The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every enemy hit. A maximum of 25 Energy can be recovered in this manner.
constellations.name: Reaction Force

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Starfell Sword by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Meteorite Impact

constellations.desc: The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer. The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.
constellations.name: Everlasting Boulder

passive_talent.desc: Reduces Starfell Sword's CD by 2s.
passive_talent.name: Shattered Darkrock

passive_talent.desc: Normal Attack sequence's final attack causes a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as Geo DMG to surrounding enemies.
passive_talent.name: Frenzied Rockslide

overview.shortdesc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes. 

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
combat_talent.name: Foreign Ironwind

combat_talent.desc:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to enemies in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

Hold:
DMG and AoE will gradually increase.

Elemental Absorption:
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro / Pyro / Cryo / Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
combat_talent.name: Palm Vortex

combat_talent.desc:
Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG. 

Elemental Absorption:
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro / Pyro / Cryo / Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
combat_talent.name: Gust Surge

constellations.desc: Palm Vortex pulls in enemies within a 5m radius.
constellations.name: Raging Vortex

constellations.desc: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.
constellations.name: Uprising Whirlwind

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Gust Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Sweeping Gust

constellations.desc: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.
constellations.name: Cherishing Breezes

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Palm Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Vortex Stellaris

constellations.desc:
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. 
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
constellations.name: Interwinded Winds

passive_talent.desc: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.
passive_talent.name: Slitting Wind

passive_talent.desc: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
passive_talent.name: Second Wind

overview.shortdesc: A perky, straightforward girl, who is also the only Outrider of the Knights of Favonius. Her amazing mastery of the glider has made her a three-time winner of the Gliding Champion in Mondstadt. As a rising star within the Knights of Favonius, Amber is always ready for any challenging tasks. - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 5 rapid shots.

Charged Attack:
Perform a more precise attack with increased damage. While aiming, Pyro accumulates in the arrowhead. When fully charged, the arrow deals high Pyro DMG.
combat_talent.name: Marksmanship

combat_talent.desc: Throws a Baron Bunny decoy which taunts nearby opponents. Baron Bunny inherits HP proportional to Amber's Max HP. Upon destruction or expiration, Baron Bunny explodes and deals Pyro DMG to all surrounding opponents. Hold to adjust the throwing distance and direction.
combat_talent.name: Explosive Puppet

combat_talent.desc: Unleashes Fiery Rain which rains down from above and deals Pyro DoT.
combat_talent.name: Fiery Rain

constellations.desc: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.
constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All

constellations.desc:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it. 
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.
constellations.name: Bunny Triggered

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Fiery Rain by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: It Burns!

constellations.desc: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.
constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Explosive Puppet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!

constellations.desc: Fiery Rain increases Amber's Movement SPD by 20% and Base ATK by 30% for 10s.
constellations.name: Wildfire

passive_talent.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10%, and AoE by 30%
passive_talent.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target

passive_talent.desc: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots increase Base ATK by 10% for 10s
passive_talent.name: Precise Shot

passive_talent.desc: Decreases all party members' gliding Stamina Consumption by 20%.
passive_talent.name: Champion Glider

overview.shortdesc: The Deaconess of the Favonius Church and a shining starlet adored by all. Although the concept of a starlet is rather novel in a city of bards, the people of Mondstadt love Barbara nonetheless.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
combat_talent.name: Whisper of Water

combat_talent.desc:
Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding enemies and afflicting them with the Wet status.

Melody Loop:
Barbara's Normal Attacks heal all party members and nearby allied characters for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP. 
Her Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing. 
Regenerates a certain amount of the current's character's HP at regular intervals.
Applies the Wet status to the character and enemies who come in contact with them.
combat_talent.name: Let the Show Begin

combat_talent.desc: Heals friendly forces and all parties for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.
combat_talent.name: Shining Miracle

constellations.desc: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.
constellations.name: Joyful Ballad

constellations.desc: Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin by 15%. During the ability's duration, the current character gains 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.
constellations.name: Vitality Burst

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Shining Miracle by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow

constellations.desc: Every enemy hit by Barbara's Charged Attack causes her to regenerate 1 Energy.
constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Let the Show Begin by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Bond of Innocence

constellations.desc:
When Barbara is not on the field, and the character in play falls: 
Automatically revives this character. 
Fully regenerates this characters HP to 100%. 
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You

passive_talent.desc: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.
passive_talent.name: Glorious Season

passive_talent.desc: When a character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of Let the Show Begin's Melody Loop is extended by 1s. The maximum extension is 5s.
passive_talent.name: Encore

passive_talent.desc: When Barbara cooks a boiled dish, the Perfect zone on the cooking meter is twice the normal size.
passive_talent.name: Give It Your All

overview.shortdesc: Captain of the Crux, with quite the reputation in Liyue. There are those who say she can split mountains and part the sea. Others say she draws lightning through her sword. Some say that even the mightiest of sea beasts are no match for her.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 5 successive strikes.

Charged Attack:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
combat_talent.name: Oceanborne

combat_talent.desc:
Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.

Press:
Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.

Hold:
Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP. 
Counterattacks with the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. The shield possesses the following properties: 
When attacked, it will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the Counterattack. This increase can take place twice within the ability's duration. 
Increases Beidou's resistance to interruption. 
Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency. 
Applies the Electro element to Beidou.
combat_talent.name: Tidecaller

combat_talent.desc:
Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself.
Thunderbeast's Targe:
When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between enemies, dealing Electro DMG.
Increases Beidou's resistance to interruption.
Triggers a maximum of 1 lightning discharge per second.
combat_talent.name: Stormbreaker

constellations.desc: When Stormbreaker is used: Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beiou's Max HP for 15s. This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.
constellations.name: Sea Beast's Scourge

constellations.desc: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.
constellations.name: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Tidecaller by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Summoner of Storm

constellations.desc: Within 10s of taking DMG, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain 20% additional Electro DMG.
constellations.name: Stunning Revenge

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Stormbreaker by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Crimson Tidewalker

constellations.desc: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding enemies is decreased by 15%.
constellations.name: Bane of the Evil

passive_talent.desc: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.
passive_talent.name: Retribution

passive_talent.desc:
Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.
passive_talent.name: Lightning Storm

passive_talent.desc: When Beioud cooks a DEF dish, her perfect cooking range is increased by 100%.
passive_talent.name: Ironclad

overview.shortdesc: The few young adventurers that the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild has always find themselves tangled up in baffling bouts of bad luck. He is the only active member of his own adventure group, known as "Benny's Adventure Team," after all the other members decided to "take leave" following a series of unfortunate incidents. As a result, the team is currently on the verge of being dissolved. Being unable to break the poor boy's heart, Katheryne of the Adventurers' Guild has kept "Benny's Adventure Team" on the books, whilst also hiding from him the fact that all the other members have long since officially left the team. - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword swings.
combat_talent.name: Strike of Fortune

combat_talent.desc:
Bennett's collective strike of zealousness, dreams, and Pyro. Though sometimes he gets a bit too overzealous, causing his Pyro energy to explode

Bennett concentrates the spirit of Adventure and Pyro into his blade. Depending on how long he charges for, different effects occur.

Tap: 
Performs a quick flaming swing with his sword.

Short Hold: 
Performs a two-stage attack that deals Pyro DMG and launches enemies.

Long Hold: 
Performs a three-stage attack that does Pyro DMG. However, the last attack causes an explosion, launching both Bennett and his enemies. Bennett is not hurt by this explosion.
combat_talent.name: Passion Overload

combat_talent.desc:
Bennett jumps towards the enemy and attacks, dealing Pyro DMG and creating an inspiration circle.
If the health of a character in the circle is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate.
If the health of a character in the circle is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus equal to a set percentage of Bennett's Base ATK.
In both cases, characters inside the circle with also gain the Pyro affix.
combat_talent.name: Fantastic Voyage

constellations.desc: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increases no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% Base ATK.
constellations.name: Grand Expectation

constellations.desc: When HP falls below 70%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.
constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror

constellations.desc: Increases Passion Overload's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor

constellations.desc: Short hold to release Passion Overload as a two-stage attack. Press the attack button to perform an additional falling attack.
constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey

constellations.desc: Increases Fantastic Voyage's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: True Explorer

constellations.desc: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's circle gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus. Normal and Charged Attacks also become Pyro attacks.
constellations.name: Fire Ventures with Me

passive_talent.desc: Decreases Passion Overload's CD by 20%.
passive_talent.name: Rekindle

passive_talent.desc: When inside Fantastic Voyage's circle, Passion Overload's CD is decreased by 50% and Bennett cannot be launched by this skill's explosion.
passive_talent.name: Fearnaught

characters.name: Chongyun

overview.shortdesc: An exorcist who roams the land with Liyue as his base of operations, evil spirits fleeing wherever he goes. As the heir to a clan of exorcists, he has always possessed abilities superior to most. However, these abilities are not the result of training, but of an inborn trait - congenital positivity. - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
combat_talent.name: Demonbane

combat_talent.desc:
"The Linlang rings, and all is silent. The rivers move not, and the clouds are heavy with frost. The altar gates open, and evil is banished."
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all DMG done through Normal and Charged Attacks by Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters will be converted to Cryo DMG.
combat_talent.name: Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost

combat_talent.desc:
"As ice doth give the biting frost birth, my transcendent blade shakes heaven and earth. Heed my summons and come hence!"
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch enemies.
combat_talent.name: Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star

constellations.desc: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all enemies in its path.
constellations.name: Ice Unleashed

constellations.desc: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.
constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Cloudburst

constellations.desc: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an enemy affected by Cold or Frozen status effects. This effect can only occur once every 2s.
constellations.name: Frozen Skies

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: The True Path

constellations.desc: Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star deals 15% more DMG to enemies with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun. This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.
constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades

passive_talent.desc: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal Attack SPD increased by 8%.
passive_talent.name: Steady Breathing

passive_talent.desc: When the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit will be summoned to strike nearby enemies, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Enemies hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 6s.
passive_talent.name: Rimechaser Blade

characters.title: Banisher of Evil and Rumors Thereof

overview.shortdesc: As the wealthiest gentleman in Mondstadt, the ever-dapper Diluc always presents himself as the epitome of perfection. But behind the courteous visage burns a zealous soul that has sworn to protect Mondstadt at all costs, allowing him to mercilessly vanquish all who threaten his city. - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
combat_talent.name: Tempered Sword

combat_talent.desc:
The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.
This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period (5s).
combat_talent.name: Searing Onslaught

combat_talent.desc:
The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.
Flames emerge from Diluc, knocking back nearby enemies. The flames then converge into the blade, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.
combat_talent.name: Dawn

constellations.desc: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to enemies whose HP is above 50%.
constellations.name: Conviction

constellations.desc:
When Diluc takes DMG, his Base ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Last for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.
constellations.name: Searing Ember

constellations.desc: Increases Searing Onslaught's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Steel and Fire

constellations.desc:
Casting Searing Onslaught in sequence greatly increases damage dealt.
Within 2s of using Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for the next 2s.
constellations.name: Flowing Flame

constellations.desc: Increases Dawn's skill level by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn

constellations.desc:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
constellations.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of Dark

passive_talent.desc: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.
passive_talent.name: Relentless

passive_talent.desc: For 12s after using Dawn, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus and his Normal and Charged Attacks deal Pyro DMG.
passive_talent.name: Blessing of Phoenix

passive_talent.desc: Diluc gains 1 additional Proficiency when he performs a Perfect Cooking.
passive_talent.name: Cook for Battle

overview.shortdesc: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz. Currently serves as an investigator in the Adventurers' Guild. Through her unique abilities, eccentric character, and (while she would never admit it herself) hard work, Fischl has become a rising star among the Adventurers' Guild's investigators, earning the recognition of all. - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the en
combat_talent.name: Bolts of Downfall

combat_talent.desc:
"My time is most precious, and I shall not waste it on the likes of you... Go, Oz, fall upon them, and bring down upon them your Rachsüchtig Blitz, that which tears open the long night."--Flowers for Princess Fischl (IV): Farewell Frau Welt
Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE.
For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby enemies with Freikugel.
Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.
Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.
combat_talent.name: Nightrider

combat_talent.desc:
"...In the hordes of beasts that follow the cursed blood, only Prince Nachtraben, who bore witness to the extinction of thousand worlds, knows her true greatness. Thus the night wings he spreads are his eternal promise to protect Her Royal Highness." -- Flowers for Princess Fishcl (I): End Time Zersetzung.
Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl. Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
Greatly decreases the DMG Fischl takes.
Deals Electro DMG to enemies she comes in contact with.
This ability can be canceled prematurely by leaving the field. Once this ability's effects end, it will return a portion of its Energy Cost.
combat_talent.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria

constellations.desc: When Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through the crow's eyes. When Fischl attacks an enemy, Oz fires a joint attack through the crow's eyes, dealing 22% of ATK DMG.
constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep

constellations.desc: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.
constellations.name: Devourer of All-Sins

constellations.desc: Increases Nightrider's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare

constellations.desc: When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding enemies. When the skill duration ends, Fischl recovers 20% of her HP.
constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak

constellations.desc: Increases Midnight Phantasmagoria's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light

constellations.desc: Increases the duration of Oz's summoning by 2s. Additionally, Oz attacks with the current character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.
constellations.name: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex

passive_talent.desc: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.
passive_talent.name: Stellar Predator

passive_talent.desc: If a character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the enemy shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.
passive_talent.name: Lightning Smite

passive_talent.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, the time consumed is reduced by 25%.
passive_talent.name: Mein Hausgarten

overview.shortdesc:
As the Acting Grandmaster of the Knights, Jean has always been devoted to her duties and maintaining peace in Mondstadt.
She had taken precautions long before the onset of Stormterror's assault, and she will guard Mondstadt with her life as always. - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an enemy using the power of wind. Launched enemies will slowly fall to the ground.
combat_talent.name: Favonius Bladework

combat_talent.desc:
That which follows Jean, the wholehearted defender, is a guardian wind that can banish danger from her comrades' presence.
Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching enemies in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.
Hold:
At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding enemies towards her front. Direction can be adjusted. Character is immobile during skill duration.
combat_talent.name: Gale Blade

combat_talent.desc:
Jean's magnanimity is as vast as the dandelion fields, and it is the root of her wish to protect others.
Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding enemies and causing Anemo DMG. At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for nearby allied units and all party members. HP restored scale off Jean's ATK.
Dandelion Field:
Continuosuly regenerates HP for one ally and imbues them with the Anemo attributes. Deals Anemo DMG to enemies entering or exiting the Field.
combat_talent.name: Dandelion Breeze

constellations.desc: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.
constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest

constellations.desc: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.
constellations.name: People's Aegis

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Dandelion Breeze by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises

constellations.desc: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all enemies have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.
constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Gale Blade by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Outbursting Gust

constellations.desc: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.
constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt

passive_talent.desc: Hits by Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.
passive_talent.name: Wind Companion

passive_talent.desc: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.
passive_talent.name: Let the Wind Lead

passive_talent.desc: When Jean crafts Talent Materials, she has a 20% chance to receive an additional crafted item.
passive_talent.name: Continuous Improvement

overview.shortdesc: In the Knights of Favonius, Kaeya is the most trusted aide for the Acting Grand Master Jean. You can always count on him to solve any intractable problems. Everyone in Mondstadt loves Kaeya, but no one knows what secrets this witty, charming knight has... - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword swings.
combat_talent.name: Ceremonial Bladework

combat_talent.desc:
Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.
Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in front of Kaeya.
combat_talent.name: Frostgnaw

combat_talent.desc:
A winsome smile, genial words, and the merciless hoarfrost that lies beneath... These are all Kaeya's weapons.
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to enemies in their path for so long as they persist.
combat_talent.name: Glacial Waltz

constellations.desc: CRIT Rate of Normal Attack and Charged Attack against enemies affected by the Cold or Frozen status effects is increased by 15%.
constellations.name: Excellent Blood

constellations.desc: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an enemy, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.
constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Frostgnaw by 3. Max upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Dance of Frost

constellations.desc:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.
constellations.name: Frozen Kiss

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Glacial Waltz by 3. Max upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace

constellations.desc: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle.
constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind

passive_talent.desc: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.
passive_talent.name: Sword of Cruelty

passive_talent.desc: Enemies Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles. Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.
passive_talent.name: Heart of the Abyss

passive_talent.desc: When Kaeya crafts Character and Weapon Materials, he has a 20% chance to receive an additional crafted item.
passive_talent.name: Energy Thirst

overview.shortdesc:
The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue ⁠— but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.
She firmly believes that humanity's future should be determined by humans themselves, and that they can even do better than the archons and adepti have done for them. In order to prove this, she works harder than anyone else. - Description from Official Website.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

harged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

Plunging Attack:
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat_talent.name: Yunlai Swordsmanship

combat_talent.desc:
Humans are like moths, endlessly chasing the flame we call gods and adepti. But this light that I have here is my own.
Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her enemies like the swift thunder. When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to enemies in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.

Hold:
Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown. Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.

Lightning Stiletto:
If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:
If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.
combat_talent.name: Stellar Restoration

combat_talent.desc:
The swiftest technique in Keqing's personal arsenal is fast enough to bring stars crashing down.
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AoE.
She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby enemies simultaneously that deal multiple instances of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.
combat_talent.name: Starward Sword

constellations.desc: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.
constellations.name: Thundering Might

constellations.desc: When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attack's hit enemies affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
constellations.name: Keen Extraction

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Starward Sword by 3.
constellations.name: Foreseen Reformation

constellations.desc: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.
constellations.name: Attunement

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
constellations.name: Beckoning Stars

constellations.desc: When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Elector DMG Bonus for 8s. Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.
constellations.name: Tenacious Star

passive_talent.desc: Within 5s of recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Electro DMG.
passive_talent.name: Thundering Penance

passive_talent.desc: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.
passive_talent.name: Aristocratic Dignity

passive_talent.desc: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.
passive_talent.name: Land's Overseer

overview.shortdesc: Knights of Favonius Spark Knight! Forever with a bang and a flash! —And then disappearing from the stern gaze of Acting Grand Master Jean. Sure, time in solitary confinement gives lots of time to think about new gunpowder formulas...But it'd still be better to not be in solitary in the first place.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Throws thing that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to enemies after a short casting time.
combat_talent.name: Kaboom!

combat_talent.desc:
Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-band-fun!
When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and ealing AoE pyro DMG with every bounce.
On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines. The mines will explode upon contact with enemies, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
Starts with 2 charges.
combat_talent.name: Jumpy Dumpty

combat_talent.desc:
The knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...
Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby enemies, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
combat_talent.name: Sparks 'n' Splash

constellations.desc: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard enemies, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.
constellations.name: Chained Reactions

constellations.desc: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decrease enemy DEF by 15% for 10s.
constellations.name: Explosive Frags

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3. Maximum level is 15.
constellations.name: Exquisite Compound

constellations.desc: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 233% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.
constellations.name: Bunny Triggered

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3. Maximum level is 15.
constellations.name: Nova Burst

constellations.desc: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, other members of the party will continuously regenerate Energy. When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
constellations.name: Blazing Delight

passive_talent.desc: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.
passive_talent.name: Pounding Surprise

passive_talent.desc: When a Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.
passive_talent.name: Sparkling Burst

overview.shortdesc: She is an intellectual witch who can never get enough naps. As the Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, Lisa is smart in that she always knows exactly what to do with whatever troubles her. As much as she loves her sleep, she still manages to keep everything under control in a calm, composed manner.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Performs up to 4 Electro attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG to all enemies in front after a short casting time.
combat_talent.name: Lightning Touch

combat_talent.desc:
Channels the power of lighting to sweep bothersome matters away.
Electro Purple is the raiment of the Rose Witch.
Press:
Releases a homing lightning orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to enemies in a small AoE.
Hold:
After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby enemies.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to enemies based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them and clears their Conductive stacks.
combat_talent.name: Violet Arc

combat_talent.desc:
This rose's beauty is incomprehensible, as are its shocking thorns.
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding enemies and dealing Electro DMG.
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back enemies and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.
combat_talent.name: Lightning Rose

constellations.desc: Lisa recovers 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
constellations.name: Infinite Circuit

constellations.desc: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects: Increases DEF by 25%. Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.
constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Lightning Rose by 3. Maximum level upgrade is 15.
constellations.name: Resonant Thunder

constellations.desc: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.
constellations.name: Plasma Eruption

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Violet Arc by 3. Maximum level upgrade is 15.
constellations.name: Electrocute

constellations.desc:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive stat onto nearby enemies.
This effect can only occur once very 5s.
constellations.name: Pulsating Witch

passive_talent.desc: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to enemies.
passive_talent.name: Induced Aftershock

passive_talent.desc: Enemies hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.
passive_talent.name: Static Electricity Field

passive_talent.desc: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to receive a 200% yield.
passive_talent.name: Potion Insight

overview.shortdesc:
A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.
Though she is often strapped for cash and lives a life of thrift, she is resolved to never use astrology for profit... It is this very resolution that has caused her to constantly fret about money.

Owner of the Jade Chamber in the skies above Liyue, there are stories abound about Ningguang, with her elegance and mysterious smile. As a Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, not only does she embody law and order, she also represents fortune and wit.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.
Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG. If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.
combat_talent.name: Sparkling Scatter

combat_talent.desc:
"The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen."
Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing Aoe Geo DMG.
Jade Screen
Blocks enemy projectiles.
Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.
Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at a time.
combat_talent.name: Jade Screen

combat_talent.desc:
"Stars shatter. Silence falls."
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her enemies that deal massive Geo DMG.
If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.
combat_talent.name: Starshatter

constellations.desc: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.
constellations.name: Piercing Fragments

constellations.desc: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.
constellations.name: Shock Effect

constellations.desc: Increases Starshatter's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars

constellations.desc: Allies within a 10m radius of the Jade Screen take 10% less Elemental DMG.
constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All the Beneath

constellations.desc: Increases Jade Screen's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen

constellations.desc: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
constellations.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars

passive_talent.desc: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.
passive_talent.name: Backup Plan

passive_talent.desc: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.
passive_talent.name: Strategic Reserve

passive_talent.desc: When Ningguang crafts Character and Weapon Materials, she has a 20% chance to recover the materials used.
passive_talent.name: Meticulous Calculation

overview.shortdesc: Like most of Mondstadt's young people, Noelle always dreamed of being a knight of Favonius when she grew up. She may not have what it takes to be a knight just yet, but she is learning. Working as a maid at the Knights' headquarters, she is constantly taking notes on what constitutes knightly speech, knightly conduct, and knightly customs. She holds firm to her belief that one day she will join their ranks - she just needs to keep trying her hardest at everything she does.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Performs up to 4 consecutive slashes

Charged Attack:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attack on all nearby enemies. At the end of the sequence, performs an additional powerful slash.
combat_talent.name: Favonius Bladework - Maid

combat_talent.desc:
Noelle is both a maid-servant and a valiant knight.
Summons protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding enemies and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF.
The shield has the following properties:
When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters, both on and off the field
Applies the Geo element to the character.
Possesses 250% Absorption Efficiency against Geo DMG
The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on on Noelle's DEF.
combat_talent.name: Breastplate

constellations.desc: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, attacks hits have a 100% chance to trigger Breastplate's healing effects.
constellations.name: I Got Your Back

constellations.desc: Decreases Noelle's Stamina Consumption of Charged Attacks by 20% and increases Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
constellations.name: Maid of Whirlwinds

constellations.desc: Increases Breastplate's skill level by 3. Max level is 15
constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid

constellations.desc: When Breastplate ends or shatters, it deals 400% of ATK as Geo DMG to surrounding enemies.
constellations.name: To Be Cleaned

constellations.desc: Increases Sweeping Time's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master

constellations.desc: Sweeping Time increases ATK by an additional 25% of Noelle's DEF. For the skill's duration, adds 1s duration time per opponent defeated, up to 10s.
constellations.name: Must Be Spotless

passive_talent.desc: When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when the active character's HP falls below 30%: Creates a shield that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF. This effect can only occur once every 60s.
passive_talent.name: Devotion

passive_talent.desc:
Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s.
Hitting multiple enemies with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.
passive_talent.name: Nice and Clean

overview.shortdesc:
An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy.
"Blessed" by the adepti with a body that cannot die, this petite zombie cannot do anything without first giving herself orders to do it.

Some say he is an orphan raised by wolves. Others say he is a wolf spirit in human form. He is most at home in the wild, fighting with claw and thunder. To this day the wolf boy can be found prowling the forest, where he and his wolf pack hunt to survive using nothing more than their animal instincts.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies. At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
combat_talent.name: Steel Fang

combat_talent.desc:
Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his Lupical.
In the movement when lightning strikes, you can sometimes glimpse the look of a predator sizing up his prey deep within Razor's eyes.
Press:
Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to enemies in front of Razor.
Upon striking an enemy, Razor gains an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.
Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.

Hold:
Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils. Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.
combat_talent.name: Claw and Thunder

combat_talent.desc:
These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield (gets swapped out for another character). When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based on the duration remaining on this skill.
The Wolf Within:
Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES.
Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status.
Disables Razor's Charged Attacks.
combat_talent.name: Lightning Fang

constellations.desc: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.
constellations.name: Wolf's Nature

constellations.desc: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.
constellations.name: Suppression

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Lightning Fang by 3. Maximum level is 15.
constellations.name: Soul Companion

constellations.desc: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.
constellations.name: Bite

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Claw and Thunder by 3. Maximum level is 15.
constellations.name: Sharpened Claws

constellations.desc: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG. When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an enemy will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder
constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris

passive_talent.desc: Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%. Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.
passive_talent.name: Awakening

passive_talent.desc: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharged by 30%.
passive_talent.name: Hunger

passive_talent.desc: Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina Consumption by 20%. The greatest effect out of all Talents of the same type prevails.
passive_talent.name: Wolvensprint

overview.shortdesc:
An alchemist with an insatiable curiosity towards the world and everything in it. Attached to the Knights of Favonius as an assistant to Albedo, her area of focus is "bio-alchemy."
She strives to enrich the world by transforming living things with the power of alchemy.
Granted, the products of her research sometimes prove to be more weird than wonderful — but on the whole, she has made monumental contributions to the field of bio-alchemy.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack:
Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.
combat_talent.name: Wind Spirit Creation

overview.shortdesc: A bard that seems to have arrived on some unknown wind - sometimes sings songs as old as the hills, and other times sings poems fresh and new. Likes apples and lively places, but is not a fan of cheese or anything sticky. When using his Anemo power to control the wind, it often appears as feathers, as he's fond of that which appears light and breezy.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

Charged Attack:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG.
combat_talent.name: Divine Archery

combat_talent.desc:
O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!
In the days when gods and men walked the earth together, the heavens were filled with countless songs. This melody has long since been forgotten

Press:
Summons a Wind Domain at the enemy's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.

Hold:
Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected enemies into the air. After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air.
Enemies hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.
combat_talent.name: Skyward Sonnet

combat_talent.desc:
Many hymns written in praise of the Anemo Archon have been lost to time. This one sings of his mastery over the wind.
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in object and enemies along its path, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

Elemental Absorption:
If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro elements, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
combat_talent.name: Wind's Grand Ode

constellations.desc: Fires 2 additional split arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.
constellations.name: Splitting Gale

constellations.desc: Skyward Sonnet decreases enemy Anemo RES by 12% for 10s. Enemies launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES penalty when airborne.
constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds

constellations.desc: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.
constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo

constellations.desc: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
constellations.name: Storm of Defiance

passive_talent.desc: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.
passive_talent.name: Embrace of Winds

passive_talent.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restored 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.
passive_talent.name: Stormeye

passive_talent.desc: Decreases all party members' gliding Stamina Consumption by 30%. The greatest effect out of all Talents of the same type prevails.
passive_talent.name: Windrider

overview.shortdesc: The Head Chef at the Wanmin Restaurant and also a waitress there, Xiangling is extremely passionate about cooking and excels at her signature hot and spicy dishes. Though still young, Xiangling is a true master of the culinary arts with all the skills of a kitchen veteran. She enjoys a good reputation among the hearty eaters at Chihu Rock. There's absolutely no need to be nervous if she wants you to sample her latest creation. It will not disappoint. Promise

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.
combat_talent.name: Dough-Fu

combat_talent.desc:
Guoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something that is spicy.
Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire at the enemy, dealing AoE Pyro DMG
combat_talent.name: Guoba Attack

combat_talent.desc:
here will never be enough heat. Never.
Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for so long as the ability persists, dealing Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path.
combat_talent.name: Pyronado

constellations.desc: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.name: Enemies hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.desc: The last attack in Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the enemy for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as Pyro DMG.
constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Pyronado by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Deepfry

constellations.desc: Pyronado's duration is increased by 40%.
constellations.name: Slowbake

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Guoba Attack by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Guoba Mad

constellations.desc: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado

passive_talent.desc: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.
passive_talent.name: Crossfire

passive_talent.desc: When Guoba Attack's effects end, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.
passive_talent.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!

passive_talent.desc: When Xiangling cooks a barbecued dish perfectly, she gains 1 additional Proficiency.
passive_talent.name: Chef de Cuisine

overview.shortdesc: One of the "Mighty and Illuminated Adepti" guarding Liyue, also heralded as the "Guardian yaksha." Despite his appearance as a young man, occasional legends about him have been documented in ancient books for thousands of years. He is especially fond of Wangshu Inn's Almond Tofu. The reason is that the dish tastes just like the "dreams" he used to devour.

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 6 rapid strikes.

Charged Attack:
Dive down and impact the ground, causing damage relative to the falling height. Can only be triggered in mid-air.
combat_talent.name: Whirlwind Thrust

combat_talent.desc:
In the legends from another land, the world would be crushed by two great wind wheels. Xiao has mastered the polearms, able to rip enemies apart like the legendary dual wind wheels.
Xiao Lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to enemies along the path. Can be used in mid-air. Has 2 charges to begin with.
combat_talent.name: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling

combat_talent.desc:
Xiao puts on the mask of the yaksha and becomes the conquered of demons. However, with great power comes great pain. As such he is known as the "Bane of All Evil".
Takes on the form of the yaksha that terrified both demons and archons alike millennia ago. For its duration, increases Xiao's attack range and DMG, while converting damage type to Anemo and enhancing Xiao's Jumping Ability. Maintaining this form continuously drains Xiao's HP.
combat_talent.name: Bane of All Evil

constellations.desc: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.
constellations.name: Dissolution Eon - Destroyer of Worlds

constellations.desc: When in party but not the currently active character, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.
constellations.name: Annihilation Eon - Blossom of Kaleidos

constellations.desc: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Evil Conqueror - Wrath Deity

constellations.desc: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, gains a 100% DEF Bonus.
constellations.name: Transcension - Extinction of Suffering

constellations.desc: Increases Bane of All Evil's skill level by 3. Max level is 15.
constellations.name: Evolution Eon - Origin of Ignorance

constellations.desc: During Bane of All Evil, hitting 2 or more enemies with a Charged Attack grants Lemniscatic Wind Cycling 1 additional charge and reduces Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's CD by 1s.
constellations.name: Evil Conqueror - Vigilant Yaksha

passive_talent.desc: Starting Bane of All Evil increases Xiao's DMG by 5%. After this, Xiao's DMG continues to increase by 5% every 3s until the skill ends. Max 25% increase.
passive_talent.name: Evil Conqueror - Tamer of Demons

passive_talent.desc: When Lemniscatic Wind Cycling is used, increases all subsequent Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's DMG by 10% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. Duration refreshes with new stacks.
passive_talent.name: Dissolution Eon - Heaven Fall

passive_talent.desc: Decreases all party member's falling DMG by 30%.
passive_talent.name: Transcension - Gravity Defier

overview.shortdesc: The second son of the Feiyun Commerce Guild, Xingqiu has had a reputation for being studious and polite ever since he was a young child. But there is another side to the mild-mannered Xingqiu everyone knows. A daring, adventurous and much more mischievous side...

combat_talent.desc:
Normal Attack:
Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack:
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
combat_talent.name: Guhua Style

combat_talent.desc:
"Easier to slay a rain dragon than to sever the rain."
Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, his ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit the character.
The Rain Swords have the following properties:
When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
Increase the character's resistance to interruption.
20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords. The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.
combat_talent.name: Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen

combat_talent.desc:
Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.
The "Way of the Rain Cutter" is one of the esoteric secret techniques of the Guhua Sect.
Rainbow Bladework:
Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attack, dealing Hydro DMG.
Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.
These effects carry over to other characters.
combat_talent.name: Guhua Sword - Raincutter

constellations.desc: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.
constellations.name: The Scent Remained

constellations.desc: Extends the duration of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3s. Decreases the Hydro RES of enemies hit by sword rain by 15%.
constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Weaver of Verses

constellations.desc: Increases Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen's DMG by 10% for every Rain Sword Xingqiu has.
constellations.name: Evilsoother

constellations.desc: Increases the level of Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.name: Embrace of Rain

constellations.desc: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword - Raincutter's sword rain attack greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit enemies.
constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses

passive_talent.desc: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 8% of Xingqiu's Max HP
passive_talent.name: Hydropathic

passive_talent.desc: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.
passive_talent.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops

weapons.name: Iron Sting
weapons.description: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.
passive_effect: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 8% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 10% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 14% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 16% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

weapons.name: Skyrider Sword
weapons.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
passive_effect: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
Using an Elemental Burst grants a 15% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
Using an Elemental Burst grants a 18% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
Using an Elemental Burst grants a 21% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
Using an Elemental Burst grants a 24% increase in Base ATK and Movement SPD for 12s.
